name: Basic Vocabulary
description: Essential everyday words and phrases for beginners in English, covering greetings, introductions, and common expressions used in daily conversations.

name: Travel and Tourism
description: Comprehensive vocabulary for travelers, including transportation, accommodation, sightseeing, and cultural experiences. Perfect for planning trips or discussing travel experiences.

name: Business English
description: Professional terminology used in corporate environments, meetings, presentations, and business correspondence. Essential for workplace communication and career advancement.

name: Academic English
description: Formal vocabulary and expressions used in educational settings, research papers, and scholarly discussions. Designed for students and professionals in academic environments.

name: Health and Medicine
description: Medical terminology covering common illnesses, body parts, treatments, and healthcare systems. Useful for doctor visits and discussing health-related topics.

name: Technology and Digital Life
description: Modern vocabulary related to computers, internet, social media, and digital innovations. Essential for navigating today's tech-driven world.

name: Environment and Sustainability
description: Terms related to climate change, conservation, renewable energy, and environmental protection. Important for discussions about our planet's future.

name: Arts and Culture
description: Vocabulary covering music, literature, visual arts, theater, and cultural traditions from around the world. Enhances appreciation and discussion of creative expressions.

name: Food and Cuisine
description: Culinary terms for ingredients, cooking methods, dining experiences, and international dishes. Perfect for food lovers and those exploring global cuisines.

name: Sports and Recreation
description: Athletic terminology covering popular sports, fitness activities, outdoor adventures, and recreational pursuits. Ideal for sports fans and active lifestyles.
